The '''first drop of 2026''', also known as '''Drop 1 of 2026'''<ref name="exp-name"/>, is an upcoming [[game drop]] that will release as [[Java Edition 26.1]] and Bedrock Edition 26.10 at an unconfirmed date. Its theme is "cuteness" and "emotional attachment to mobs".<ref>{{ytl|FaLDBHodmGs|THE CUTEST DROP YET!|Minecraft|January 7, 2026|t=260}} (4:20)</ref> It gives unique designs to various [[baby]] animals, redesigns [[rabbit]]s, and makes [[name tag]]s craftable. Some features of this drop will be available earlier in [[Bedrock Edition 26.0]] behind the "Drop 1 of 2026" [[experiment]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Name Tag JE2 BE2.png|32px]] [[Name tag]]'''
* Is now craftable. The recipe is:
{{Crafting
|A3=Paper
|B2=Any Nugget
|Output=Name Tag
|ignoreusage=1
}}

'''[[Spawn egg]]'''
* Now always spawns baby mobs when used on the same mob {{in|be}}, to match {{JE}}. This does not require the Drop 1 of 2026 experiment in Bedrock Edition 26.0.
